strapiPost.title: Holiday Singalong
strapiPost.content:
You might discover a new holiday tradition at Big Box Karaoke after one night of singalongs, food, drinks, and fun. 

  • Gather: Big Box Karaoke has private boxes ready to rent out for large and small parties and is a great environment for all ages. As the only place like it in Northwest Arkansas, it’s a must try. 
  • Lounge: Enjoy a full bar and food menu with quality options served directly to your box so you can focus on being a star. There are over 70,000 songs available to choose from, and we’re betting your favorite is on the list. 

Click HERE to book your party.
